availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Louisiana soldier. Colonel in the 1st Louisiana Volunteer Cavalry Regiment (C.S.A.) from September 11, 1861 to 1865.

ab.bibl:
Benjamin Franklin Cooling, Forts Henry and Donelson: The Key to the Confederate Heartland (Knoxville: The University of Tennessee Press, 1989), 37.
Compiled Service Records of Confederate Soldiers Who Served in Organizations from the State of Louisiana NARA RG 109, Microfilm Series M320, Roll 0006.
_Biennial Report of the Secretary of State of Louisiana to His Excellency Sam'l D. McEenery, 1886-87 (Baton Rouge: Leon Jastremski, State Printer, 1888), 130.
